class.name: ManyBoneIK3D
class.brief_description: A node for inverse kinematics which may modify more than one bone.
class.description: Base class of [SkeletonModifier3D] that has some joint lists and applies inverse kinematics. This class has some struct, enum and helper methods which useful to solve the inverse kinematics.

method.name: reset
method.description: Resets a state with respect to the current bone pose.
